summary:
Provides a means of having a unique visual body as compared to the NPCs.
Some restrictions apply, see inside for details.
descriptionHtml:
[color=deeppink][size=5][center]Isharas Custom Player Body[/center][/size][/color]

[color=orange]Purpose:[/color]
To provide a means of having a unique visual body when compared to those of the NPCs.

[color=orange]Scenarios Where This Would Be Useful:[/color]
-- Player wants a different shapped body that uses same texture as NPC body
-- Player wants a tattoo or other texture tweak that uses the same body as the NPC body
-- Player wants both a different shapped body and tweaked texture that is in the same body family (i.e. UNP or CBBE)

[color=orange]Intended Audience:[/color]
Users that are happy with my presets
Advanced users that understand file structure and how to override BSA contents with loose files

[color=orange]Load Order:[/color]
It has been reported that this mod needs to be loaded AFTER other mods that affect the player's appearance. BOSS may not sort the mod appropriately. Manual adjustment may be required.

[color=orange]Mods reported to need to be loaded before this mod:[/color]
RaceMenu 
Enhanced Character Edit

[color=orange]Installation:[/color]
Use Nexus Mod Manager where applicable
Manual -- extract to your Skyrim > Data directory

[color=orange]Uninstallation:[/color]
Use Nexus Mod Manager where applicable
Manual -- delete the files listed below plus any customization files

[color=orange]Folders & Files:[/color]
Isharas_CustomPlayerBody.esp
Isharas_CustomPlayerBody.bsa
Isharas_CustomPlayerBody.bsl
Docs > Isharas_customPlayerBodyInfo.txt

[color=orange]Default setup:[/color]
Both genders 
-- stock files used in all cases where specified mod files were not
-- No More Ugly Bronze Shine by yllib included
Male Player
-- For all intents a stock body without the underwear mesh but with "speedo" 
-- pulled from a moderate muscular/hairy setup made with Better Males by Chris57
Female Player
-- UNP Main with UNP Curvy v1 overlaid -- nude NSFW

[color=orange]Customization:[/color]
You may overwrite either or both genders with any setup of your choice

To do so create the following directories in your data folder:
-- Meshes > abim > CustomPlayer
-- Textures > abim > CustomPlayer

Supported files:
-- Textures --
femalebody_1.dds
femalebody_1_msn.dds
femalebody_1_s.dds
femalebody_1_sk.dds
femalehands_1.dds
femalehands_1_msn.dds
femalehands_1_s.dds
femalehands_1_sk.dds
malebody_1.dds
malebody_1_msn.dds
malebody_1_s.dds
malebody_1_sk.dds
malehands_1.dds
malehands_1_msn.dds
malehands_1_s.dds
malehands_1_sk.dds

-- Meshes --
1stpersonfemalebody_0.nif
1stpersonfemalebody_1.nif
1stpersonfemalehands_0.nif
1stpersonfemalehands_1.nif
1stpersonfemalehandsargonian_0.nif
1stpersonfemalehandsargonian_1.nif
1stpersonmalebody_0.nif
1stpersonmalebody_1.nif
1stpersonmalehands_0.nif
1stpersonmalehands-1.nif
1stpersonmalehandsargonian_0.nif
1stpersonmalehandsargonian_1.nif
femalebody_0.nif
femalebody_1.nif
femalefeet_0.nif
femalefeet_1.nif
femalehands_0.nif
femalehands_1.nif
malebody_0.nif
malebody_1.nif
malefeet_0.nif
malefeet_1.nif
malehands_0.nif
malehands_1.nif

[color=orange]Notes:[/color]
-- Player is responsible for obtaining a head/face mod that matches both the body used for NPCs and the body used for the player.
-- Highly recommended to first setup your body & face mods in the default locations of:
Data > Textures > actors > character > female
Data > Textures > actors > character > male
Data > Meshes > actors > character > character assets
Then copy/paste those setups to the customization locations.
-- If stock files are required, those may be extracted from the Skyrim - Textures.bsa and Skyrim - Meshes.bsa using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/247]BSAopt[/url]  or similar program.
-- Khajiits and Argonians have limited support. Body mesh changes are supported, but body texture changes are not supported.

[color=orange]Compatibilities or lack thereof:[/color]
Will conflict with any mod that changes the player record.  Some conflicts may be merged.
Example mod conflict that could be merged:  
Mannequins Look Like You  
-- MLLY changes the gender of the player record in order to force the mannequins to use the same gender as the player. 

[color=orange]Credits & Sources:[/color]
Bethesda for Skyrim & the Creation Kit
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/?]Chris57 & Better Males for the male body setup source[/url] ---- permissions section indicates free usage with credit
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]dimon99 & Dimonized UNP female body[/url] ---- permission given in mod page announcement
Halofarm & UNP Curvy V1 (no longer available) -- [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/]Halofarm's mod site[/url] ---- permission granted by Halofarm (see about page on Halofarm's site for general permission information)

[color=orange]Permissions:[/color]
You may adapt as necessary for your personal games
Ask to use, adapt and/or modify for public release
If you have not heard back from me within 14 days and my last forum access was 90 days or greater -- permission granted.
Please be sure to obtain any neccessary permissions from other authors
author: IsharaMeradin
